loans.name: Ignacio Ramon

texts.es: Ignacio Ramón tiene 26 años, su actividad económica es la venta de teléfonos celulares. Hace más de 2 años que se dedica a este negocio, por lo que es un hombre muy responsable y además disfruta de su bello trabajo, por lo que cada día disfruta de su actividad económica y de relacionarse con cada uno de sus clientes, que son sus mismos vecinos por lo que siempre esta interactuando con ellos. Por lo que está solicitando financiamiento para la compra de muy buenos teléfonos ya que tiene ciertos pedidos pendientes,  y así satisfacer a su clientela. El desea construir cuartos suficientes en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ignacio Ramón is 26 years old.  He has been selling cell phones for a living for more than 2 years now.  He is a very responsible man and enjoys his job immensely.  He enjoys what he does as well as the interactions he has with his each one of his customers, who also happen to be his neighbors.  

He is requesting a loan to buy high quality telephones to fulfill outstanding orders and satisfy his customers .  

He would also like to add more rooms on to his house.

loans.use: To purchase cell phones

loans.name: Maame Tweba Augustina

texts.en: Maame Tweba Augustina A. sells foodstuffs and provisions at Elmina. Maame has been through junior high school.  She is married and has two children. She assists her husband in feeding, clothing and educating her children. Her loan will be used to buy more goods to sell. She hopes to reinvest her additional income back into her business.

loans.use: To buy more goods to sell.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent is 27 years old. He is married and has one child who is six months old. His wife works as a farmer. 

Vincent sells cattle and green bananas. He has spent eight years in this business. He is requesting a loan to buy more cattle and green bananas to sell. He says that he wants to expand his business because it has helped him to provide for his family over these years. He will save and reinvest some of the profit from this business. 

In the future he would like to sell a variety of products and to add more value to what he has been doing.

loans.use: To buy cattle and green bananas to sell

loans.name: Bertha Justina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR D. COYLLORITTI D. CCORAO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Corao, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco  y departamento D. Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Bertha Justina; ella tiene 59 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. comida y también se dedica a la agricultura, ella venD. comida en la feria del distrito D. Corao desD. las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m y también tiene un pequeño terreno D. cultivo donD. siembra maíz, papa y habas, ella quiere tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne, pollo y verduras.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Bertha Justina is a member of the community bank "Señor D. Coylloritti D. Corao".  The bank is located in the Corao district in the province and department of Cusco.

Bertha Justina is 59 years old, married, and has five children.  Her daily tasks are shared between her business that sells food and working in agriculture.  She sells food in the market in the district of Corao from 8:00am until 5:00pm and also has a small plot where she grows corn, potatoes, and beans.  She would like to own a restaurant.

She is asking for this loan to purchase food to cook, like meat, chicken, and vegetables.

She thanks everyone who is helping her achieve her dream and she promises to make all of her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase food products like meat, chicken, and vegetables

loans.name: Regina Maame Mansah

texts.en: Regina Maame Mansah P. is married to a driver and lives together with her two children. She has no educational background. Regina operates a food joint where she sells a variety of food at Elmina. This business has been in operation for about eight years. Regina uses the income she gets from her sales to help her husband to take care of the family. The loan is going to help her to expand her food business. She plans to put up a better structure where she can sell her food.

loans.use: To expand her food business.

loans.name: Rosa Alpina

texts.es: Rosa Alpina es una madre de familia de 25 años, tiene 2 hijos de los cuales ambos están a su cargo. Desde hace 3 años que tiene este negocio como es la venta de ropa, funcionando de la manera ambulante, ella atiende personalmente su negocio y siempre ha contado con el apoyo familiar. Ella tiene cierta experiencia en financiamientos y todos han sido destinados para mejorar su negocio. Actualmente ella solicita este financiamiento para capital de trabajo que será destinado para la compra de pantalones, camisas, trajes, pantalones de vestir entre otras cosas. Su deseo es mantener esta actividad económica ya que en estos tiempos es muy difícil porque hay mucha competencia.
texts.en:
Rosa Alpina is a 25 year old mother of two children who are in her care.  For three years she has been an itinerant clothing merchant.  She tends to her business personally and has always had family support.

She has some experience with loans, all of which have been used to improve her business.  She is asking for this loan to buy pants, shirts, suits and dress pants among other things.

Her wish is to stay in this business because sometimes it’s very difficult due to the high level of competition.

loans.use: To buy clothes among other things.

loans.name: Work Together Group

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, is very please to present to you the members of the “Work Together” group. These are small-scale entrepreneurs who have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to seek a loan of SLL 500,000.00 each to invest in their respective businesses. 

Fatmata B. is the leader of this group. Fatmata is a twenty-seven-year-old woman who was born in Makeni. She is married and has two children who attend primary school. Fatmata sells food and has been a businesswoman for thirteen years. With the help of this loan, she will invest in her business by buying bags of gari, a fast food made from cassava roots, to add to her business.

loans.use: Buys bags of gari to add to her business

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE COYLLORITTI DE CCORAO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Corao, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Cecilia; ella tiene 28 años de edad y es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes donde vende arroz, azúcar, aceite y galletas, ella trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m y por medio de este pequeño negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar la tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Cecilia, 28, is a single mother of two children.  She is a member of the “SEÑOR DE COYLLORITTI DE CCORAO” communal bank located in Corao district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

She alternates her daily activities with running a grocery store where she sells rice, sugar, cooking oil and cookies.  She works from 6am until 10pm and has been able to support her children through this small business.  She wants to expand the store and is asking for a loan to buy products like rice, sugar, milk and cooking oil.

She thanks all those who share her dream and pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy products like rice, sugar, milk and cooking oil.

loans.name: Grace Maame Efua

texts.en: Grace Maame Efua A. is a hairdresser by profession at Elmina. The hairdressing business was not doing so well and so upon receiving the loan, she decided to divert into food selling. Grace sells various kinds of foods, such as fufu, banku, rice balls and others. She was able to successfully start with the first loan. Grace is asking for another loan to enable her to buy more food items to cook and sell. She has been through junior high school. She is married to a mason. She hopes to reinvest her additional income into her business.

loans.use: To buy more food items to cook and sell.

loans.name: Constansa

texts.es: Constansa, de 35 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y alegre, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Abdón de 46 años y sus 5 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar un mejor futuro. Con mucho esfuerzo Constansa ha logrado trabajar sus tierras y volverlas muy productivas, ella cultiva, café, caco y hoja de coca, productos que posteriormente lleva a vender hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, donde las vende al por mayor a sus compradores, quienes esperan sus cultivos debido a la buena calidad que tienen. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que los sacos que lleva son muy pesados y la cansan mucho. En adelante, desea comprar nuevas tierras para ampliar sus plantaciones. Este es el décimo cuarto crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en sus anteriores créditos y espera serlo también ahora. En su banco comunal es una socia muy participativa y siempre esta al tanto de los acuerdos a los que llegan en su grupo. Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, hará limpiar su chacra y contratará peones, para que la ayuden en el cultivo.
texts.en:
Constansa is 35 years old.  She is a very humble and happy woman.  She lives in her own home together with her husband Abdón who is 46 years old and her 5 beloved children for whom she wants to provide a better future.  With a lot of effort Constansa has managed to work her land and make it very productive.  She grows coffee, cacao and coca leaf, products which she then takes to sell in the city of San Francisco.  She sells her products wholesale to her customers who wait for her crops owing to their good quality.  What she most likes about her work is tending to her crops which she does with a lot of care.  She has been in this business for 15 years and considers the most difficult thing about her work to be transporting her products since the sacks that she carries are very heavy and they make her very tired.  In the future she would like to buy new land to widen her plantations.

This is her fourteenth loan from MFP.  She has been very punctual in making repayments on her previous loans and she hopes to keep this up.  She is a very active member of her community bank and she is always up to date with the agreements which they reach in her group.  She will use the 1,000 nuevos soles which she is requesting to clean her farm and to contract laborers to help her with her crops.

loans.use: To contract laborers to help her to clean her farm and grow crops

loans.name: Nana Esi

texts.en: Nana Esi O. smokes fish for sale at Elmina. Nana has received a junior high education. She is married and has four children. Her husband is a security man. She assists her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. She is requesting a loan to buy more fresh fish to smoke to meet the increasing demands of her customers. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to build a house.

loans.use: To buy more fresh fish to smoke to meet the increasing demands of her customers.

loans.name: Harriette

texts.en:
Harriette is 49 years old. She is a widow and has three children between the ages of 20 and 29. Her first born got married and the other one dropped out of school. Harriette has one dependent. 

Harriette sells soft drinks. She has had this business for 13 years. With this loan she will buy more drinks to sell and the profit from this business will help her renovate her house. 

She is happy with her business because it has enabled her to meet the needs of her family. In the future, she would like to be a sole distributor of soft drinks.

loans.use: To buy more soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Felipa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR D. COYLLORITTI D. CCORAO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Corao, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco  y departamento D. Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Felipa; ella tiene 52 años D. edad y es divorciada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. carne y productos agrícolas, ella tiene un pequeño puesto en el distrito D. Corao, la socia quiere tener una tienda para poder vender la carne y productos agrícolas como maíz, habas y papa.la socia quiere ampliar su puesto. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos agrícolas y carne al por mayor.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Felipa belongs to the “Señor D. Coylloritti D. Corao” community bank.  The bank is located in Corao district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.

Felipa is 52 years old.  She is divorced and has 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling meat and agricultural products.  She has a small stall in Corao district.  She would like to have a store so that she can sell her meat and agricultural products such as corn, beans and potatoes.  She would like to expand her stall.  She is requesting this loan to buy agricultural products and meat wholesale.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy agricultural products and meat wholesale

loans.name: Luvy Jeaneth

texts.es: Luvy Jeaneth vive en su propia casa con su hijo que todavía depende de ella. Hace más de 8 años que se dedica a la venta de ropa. Anteriormente ella no tenía el capital suficiente para seguir adelante, ya para iniciar a trabajar una amiga le facilito un préstamo y poco a poco ha ido creciendo con su negocio. El financiamiento que solicita es para capital de trabajo para la compra de productos. Su deseo es proporcionarle mejoras a su humilde vivienda para sus hijos.
texts.en: Luvy Jeaneth lives in her own home with her son who is still dependent on her.  She has been in the clothes selling business for more than 8 years.  In the past, she didn't have sufficient capital to keep moving forward but a friend gave her a loan to start her business and little by little she has been growing her business.  The loan she is requesting is for working capital with which to buy products.  Her dream is to improve her humble house for her children.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Queen

texts.en: Queen T. sells cooking utensils and cloth at Abura. Queen has been though senior high school. She is a single parent taking care of her son. She started her business not long ago. She is requesting a loan to enable her to expand her business by buying more cooking utensils and cloth for sale. She responsibly sees to the well-being of her home. She hopes to save towards her child’s education with the additional income.

loans.use: To buy more cooking utensils and cloth for sale.

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es: Fortunata, de 41 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Edgar de 40 años y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo al que Fortunata se dedica, es el cultivo de cacao, café y hoja de coca. Todos los días, muy temprano por la mañana, trabaja en sus cultivos, ya que sabe que el dinero que obtenga de la venta de su cosecha en la ciudad de San Francisco, dependerá mucho de la calidad de sus productos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras, ya que así siente que los meses de trabajo han tenido sus frutos, lleva 16 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus tierras. En adelante, espera sembrar todas sus tierras, pata obtener mejores ingresos. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP, manifiesta que este aporte le ayudará mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es muy querida por el resto de sus compañeras, ya que es muy solidaria con ellas. Con los tres mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará insumos para proteger sus cultivos de la plaga de insectos.
texts.en: Fortunata is 41 years old.  She is a very humble and hard-working woman who lives in her own home together with her 40 year-old husband Edgar and her 3 beloved children for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life.  Fortuna works growing cacao, coffee and coca leaf.  Every day she gets up very early in the morning and tends to her crops since she knows that the money she gets from the sale of her harvest in the city of San Francisco will depend to a large extent on the quality of her produce.  What she likes most about her work is harvesting her land since this makes her feel that the months of work have borne fruit.  She has been in this business for 16 years and she considers that the most difficult thing about her work is spraying her land.  In the future, she hopes to sow all her land to obtain better profits.  This is her third loan from MFP.  She tells us that this support will help her a lot in making progress in her work.  She will use the 3,000 nuevos soles requested to buy supplies to protect her crops from insect infestations.

loans.use: To buy supplies to protect her crops from insect infestations

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE COYLLORITTI DE CCORAO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Corao, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Marisol; ella tiene 27 años de edad y es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida, ella prepara diferentes tipos de comida en la feria del distrito de Corao en forma ambulatoria, ella trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m y por medio de este pequeño negocio saca adelante a sus hijos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, azúcar, aceite y leche.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Marisol belongs to the “Señor de Coylloritii de Corao” community bank.  The bank is located in Corao district, in Cusco province, in the department of Cusco.

Marisol is 27 years old.  She is a single mother and has 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling food.  She sells different food in the Corao district fair as a street trader.  She works from 7.00am to 5.00pm and through this small business she is getting her children ahead.  She is requesting this loan to buy cooking ingredients such as rice, sugar, oil and milk.

She is grateful to those who will take part in her dream by funding her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy cooking products such as rice, sugar, oil and milk

loans.name: Joyce Adjoa

texts.en: Joyce Adjoa N. is married and has three children. She has received a senior high education. Joyce operates a bar where she sells soft drinks at Abura. She has been in this trade for five years. Her husband is a driver. Joyce uses her income to assist her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. She is going to use the loan to purchase more soft drinks to meet the requests of her customers. With the new profits from her expanded business, Joyce plans to build a house.

loans.use: To purchase more soft drinks to meet the requests of her customers.

loans.name: Comfort Esi Fosua

texts.en: Comfort Esi fosua A. cooks food to sell at Abura. She is divorced and has six dependants. Comfort has been cooking for sale for four years. She ensures the well-being of her family. Her loan will be used to buy additional foodstuffs to cook to meet the demands of her consumers.  She hopes to use the new profits from her business to provide a better education for her dependants.

loans.use: To buy additional foodstuffs to cook to meet the demands of her consumers.

loans.name: Marisa Leticia

texts.es: Doña Marisa Leticia, tiene 38 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos, es estudiante y maestra a la vez, ya que imparte clases en una escuela de la cual proviene su fuente de ingreso, actualmente estudia para tener un mejor futuro, y por necesidades estudiantiles se acercó a las oficinas de ASDIR para solicitar un préstamo, que le servira para gastos eventuales de estudio y compra de material didactico, es una persona trabajadora y responsable, por los que tiene grandes espectativas de superación para darle de esta forma un mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Marisa Leticia, 38, has three children.  She’s both a student and a teacher because she teaches in a local school, which is her main source of income, and she is also studying in order to have a better future.

She approached ASDIR’s offices to request a loan that will serve to pay educational fees and to buy teaching supplies.

She is a hard working, responsible person with great expectations for personal growth in order to provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: For educational expenses.

loans.name: Erick Jose

texts.es: Erick José tiene 35 años, como todo padre responsable, le gusta proporcionarles a sus 2 hijos lo más básico. Su negocio consiste en una panadería, la ubicación de su negocio es en su propia vivienda, además manda a una persona a vender a las calles y él se esfuerza para la elaboración de  productos. El financiamiento que solicita es para capital de trabajo que será destinado para la compra de queso, mantequilla, huevo, harina entre otros. Su deseo es establecer un negocio en el mercado para obtener más clientes.
texts.en:
Erick José is 35 years old.  Like all responsible fathers, he likes to give his two children the basic necessities.  He has a bakery business in his own house.  

Also, he sends a person to sell on the streets, and Erick José makes the products.

The loan he is requesting is for working capital to buy cheese, butter, eggs, and flour, among other things.  He wishes to set up a business in the market in order to get more customers.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Carmensitas Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama “CARMENSITAS”, está integrado por 15 clientas, se encuentra en una comunidad del Estado D. México, en este grupo se encuentra la señora JUANA MARIBEL E. D. 40 años D. edad, quien es la presidenta D. dicho grupo, tiene 4 hijos D. 19, 18, 10 y 9 años; los cuales en la actualidad se encuentran estudiando, dos  D. ellas realizan estudios universitarios. La señora nos comenta que desD. hace ya 20 años es Profesora D. educación para los adultos en la Escuela Miguel Hidalgo, en la comunidad D. Santa María Totoltepec, en esta localidad conoció a un grupo D. mujeres que al igual que ella tenían una mismo interés social, salir adelante, al conocer una institución que confiaba en ellas, decidió juntar a un grupo D. mujeres emprendedoras y aprovechar el tiempo que le quedaba libre para continuar con la venta D. ropa usada en un lugar conocido como “ el bordo”. Quiere el crédito para invertir en mercancía, continuar con su negocio. La ilusión que tiene es que sus hijos puedan continuar con su educación.
texts.en:
This group is named Carmensitas, and it is comprised of 15 members.  It is located in a community in the state of México.  

Juana Maribel E., age 40, is the president of the group.  She has four children; ages 19, 18, 10, and 9.  The children attend school, and two of them are university students.  For 20 years Juana Maribel has been an adult education teacher at the Miguel Hidalgo school in the Santa María Totoltepec community.

She met a group of women there.  Like her, they had the same interest in getting ahead.  Upon finding out about an institution that trusted them, she decided to get a group of enterprising women together.  They take advantage of their free time to continue selling used clothes in a place known as “El Bordo”.

She wants the loan to invest in merchandise to continue in her business.  The hope that she has is that her children are able to continue with their education.

loans.use: To invest in her business

loans.name: Indiana Maria

texts.es: Indiana tiene 44 años, es madre de 2 hijos menores de edad que están a su cargo. Desde hace mas de 6 años que se dedica a este negocio, por lo que sus inicios son con esfuerzos propios, pues desde muy joven su Mama le enseño a ganarse la vida vendiendo ropa y cosméticos, Indiana no tuvo la oportunidad de finalizar sus estudios, por lo que tenía que ayudar a su Mama a vender es por eso que lucha todos los días para darle esa oportunidad a sus hijos, a pesar de las difíciles situaciones que ha enfrentado sigue con esta actividad. Ella invertirá el financiamiento en materia prima. Sueña con mejorar su vivienda, pues todavía no tiene ciertos servicios básicos.
texts.en:
Indiana is 44 years old, and she has two minor children under her care.  She has been working in her business for over six years.  She started the business through her own efforts.  When she was very young, her mother taught her how to earn a living by selling clothes and cosmetics.

Indiana did not have the opportunity to complete her education.  She had to help her mother sell.  That is why she struggles every day to give this opportunity to her children.

In spite of the difficult situations she has faced, she continues with her business activity.

She will use the loan for merchandise.  She dreams of improving her home because she still does not have certain basic services.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Moises Elias

texts.es: Moisés Elías tiene 32 años, el es responsable de 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Su actividad económica es la compra, venta y crianza de cerdos, pues siempre está buscando la manera de salir adelante. El tiene más de 10 años de estar en este negocio, por lo que siempre se ha preocupado por mejorar la condición económica de su familia, como padre responsable siempre le ha gustado trabajar. El financiamiento que actualmente está solicitando es para la compra de cerdos y alimentos para los mismos ya que esta caro, por lo que tiene una buena demanda hasta los momentos. Sueña con mejorar su negocio y además poder ofrecerles a sus hijos lo necesario.
texts.en:
Moisés Elías, 32, has three minor children in his care.  He raises pigs because he’s always looking for ways to get ahead.

He has been in this business for over 10 years always looking for ways to improve his family’s economic condition.  As a responsible father he has always liked to work.

The loan he is asking for now is to buy pigs and feed for them because it’s currently quite expensive; to date, demand for them is good.

He dreams with improving his business and to be able to provide for all his children’s needs.

loans.use: To buy pigs and pig feed.

loans.name: Julio Adolfo

texts.es: Julio Adolfo tiene 43 años con 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Esta es la primera vez que realizara financiamientos con Fundación. Su actividad es venta y elaboración de pan, por lo que él siempre está buscando la forma de salir adelante ya que tiene una familia que mantener, cuando el inicio este trabajo no tenía suficiente capital de trabajo, pero con la ayuda de la confianza que ha logrado alcanzar sus objetivos. Es así que decide realizar un financiamiento destinado para la compra de mantequilla, huevo, queso y harina. Su deseo es seguir trabajando duro para proporcionarles a sus hijos estudios.
texts.en:
Julio Adolfo is 43 years old and has two young children in his care.  This is the first time he has asked for a loan with the Foundation.

He works baking and selling bread.  He is always looking for a way to improve his business, and he has a family to support.  When he started this work, he didn't have enough working capital, but with confidence, he has achieved his objectives.  

He is asking for this loan to purchase butter, eggs, cheese, and flour.  His dream to continue working hard so he can pay for his children's education.

loans.use: Purchase supplies for his bakery.

loans.name: La Familia Renacer 3 & 4 Group

texts.es:
Eulalia es una D. los miembros del Grupo L. Familia renacer 3 y 4, compuesto por 10 micro-empresarias, todos están dedicados a las ventas D. ropa, productos naturales, zapatos, venta D. alimentos, etc. Su familia está compuesta por elL., su esposo y 3 hijos. Nos dice que su reto o desafío más difícil es poder terminar L. parte delantera D. su casa, L. cual empezó a construir y aun no ha podido terminar. Le encanta cantar y bailar en sus tiempos libres y también jugar juegos D. mesas en su casa con sus amigas.

Eulalia está muy emocionada D. recibir su quinto préstamo en Esperanza Internacional, después D. haber pagado satisfactoriamente su préstamo anterior y haber dado un paso para el crecimiento D. su negocio. ElL. ha tenido su negocio por alrededor D. 5 años, el cual inició con un dinero que le dio su esposo para que iniciara a negociar. Eulalia está planificando invertir su nuevo préstamo en su negocio, en el cual venD. ropas D. segunda mano D. muy buena calidad y comprara 3 paquetes D. estas para revenderlas por piezas. ElL. va a utilizar sus ganancias para comprar una nevera, ahorrar y reparar su casa, su sueño es poder tener una tienda D. ropa bien establecido. Vive en L. ciudad D. S., siendo esta L. segunda mas granD. del país, cuya economía depenD. D. L. agricultura, ganadería y D. L. producción D. tabaco entre otras; también cuenta con una amplia población D. dominicanos y emigrantes haitianos que viven en comunidades D. muy escasos recursos.
texts.en:
Eulalia is one of the members of the “L. Familia Renacer 3 y 4” (To Be Reborn Family 3 & 4) group which has 10 micro businesswomen.  They are involved in clothing sales, natural products sales, shoe sales, food sales, etc.  Eulalia’s family is maD. up of herself, her husband and three children. She tells us that her greatest challenge is finishing the front part of her house which she started building but hasn’t been able to finish yet.  She loves to sing and dance in her free time and also to play board games at home with her girl friends.

Eulalia is very excited to receive her fifth loan from Esperanza Internacional having satisfactorily repaid her previous loan and taken an important step in her business’ growth.

She has had her business for about 5 years; she started it with a little money her husband gave her to start.  She is planning on investing the new loan in her business, which is good quality used clothing sales.  She will buy three bundles of clothes to resell by the piece.

She will use profits to buy a new refrigerator, for savings and to repair her house.  Her dream is to have an established clothing store.

She lives in the city of S. which is the country’s second largest.  Its economy depends on agriculture, cattle-raising and tobacco farming, among others.  It also has a sizeable population of Dominicans and Haitian immigrants who live in communities of very limited resources.

loans.use: To buy several bundles of clothing.

loans.name: Josefina Hortencia

texts.es: Josefina Hortenciab T. G.,es una señora casada, tiene 30 años de edad, tiene un hijo, ella es de oficios Secretaria Bilingue con Orientación en computación, actualmente se desempeña como profesional en un colegio, ubicado en este mucicipio y departamento, donde devenga un ingreso que es suficiente para sostener a su familia, por motivos personales tiene que hacer una gasto, por lo que se presentó a ASDIR, para solicitar un prestamo que le servirá para realizar un evento festivo, con el plan de pagos que se le hace acepta la misma, sabiendo que es parte de su desarrollo familiar, como también social.
texts.en:
Josefina Hortencia T. G., 30, is married and has a son.  She is employed as a Bilingual Secretary with an emphasis in Computer Skills at a local high school, located in this municipality and department, where she earns a monthly salary sufficient to support her family.

She has a personal expenditure due to personal reasons.  She came by ASDIR to request a loan that will make it possible for her to carry out a festive event.

She accepts the loan with its attendant payment plan cognizant that it is part of her family and social development.

loans.use: To pay for a festive event.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: La Señora Maria Elena tiene la edad de 58 años, su estado civil es casada. Doña Maria tiene 4 hijos y trabajan de manera independiente. Su actividad económica es el servicio de salón de belleza. Hace más de 30 años que se dedica a este negocio ya que por medio de su familia fue que obtuvo este negocio y ahora su interés es seguir con este medio de supervivencia. Ella es una mujer muy luchadora a pesar de la edad que posee, es una mujer que le gusta este tipo renegocio. Sus propósitos para su negocio son de invertir lo suficiente para que mantener a sus clientes ya que es la única que ofrece un buen servicio. Este el motivo por el cual solicita financiamiento destinado para capital de trabajo y comprar los productos necesarios para su salón.
texts.en:
María Elena, 58, is married.  She has four children who work independently.  She has had a beauty salon for over 30 years.  She got the business through her family and she wants to continue with this source of support.

She is a very hard working woman despite her age; she likes this type of business.  Her goals for the business is to invest enough in it to keep her customers because she’s the only one providing good service.  This is why she’s asking for a loan which will be used as working capital to buy needed supplies for her salon.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es: La señora Manuela Montañés Avilés cuenta con un negocio desde hace 2 años de la venta de medio uso el cual esta en buena calidad y un buen precio que ofrece solo los Jueves a Domingo en una de la pulgas muy conocida en la localidad. Manuela quiere estar preparada para la temporada de frio es por ello que quiere comprar mas mercancía para ofrecer mas variedad.
texts.en:
Manuela Montañés Avilés has owned a used clothing business for two years.  She offers good quality clothing at a low price.  She sells her clothing in a market in her area from Thursday to Sunday. 

Manuela would like to prepare for the cold weather ahead and purchase more merchandise to have a greater variety.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise for her used clothing business

loans.name: Miriam Esnith

texts.es:
Miriam está renovando ahora su credikiva porque va a comprar materiales para producir rodillos plásticos que tiene encargado,  poco a poco va desarrollando su negocio y esto la mantiene tranquila; el anterior credikiva  lo invirtió en la compra de un molde y adecuó la maquina inyectora de plástico, sus clientes han aumentado y ahora tiene  la maquinaria funcionando al 100%. Si usted quiere conocer la historia de Miriam no deje de hacer clip en el siguiente enlace:
http://kiva.org/lend/191649
texts.en:
Miriam is renewing her Kiva loan because she is going to buy supplies to manufacture plastic rollers she has on order.  She is developing her business gradually and this keeps her at ease.

She used the previous Kiva loan to buy a molding machine and to equip a plastic injecting machine.  

The number of her customers has increased and now her machinery is working at 100%.

If you’d like to know Miriam’s story, you may click on the following link:

http://kiva.org/lend/191649

loans.use: To buy plastic and roller handles.

loans.name: Henry Ismael

texts.es: Henry Ismael tiene 21 años, su estado civil es soltero. Tiene 1 hijo y estudia. El se dedica a la actividad económica de venta de ropa. Hace más de 5 años que se dedica a este negocio. Por lo que inicio ofreciendo ciertos productos, ya que no tenía mucho capital de trabajo. Su negocio fue una herencia de su familia. Por lo que el principal objetivo es satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes ofreciéndoles lo que ellos solicitan. Es así como recurre a Fundación León 2000 ya que por medio ella las organizaciones amigas dan el apoyo necesario y solicita el financiamiento para capital de trabajo para materia prima. El deseo de Henry es ampliar su negocio.
texts.en: Henry Ismael is 21 years old and single.  He has one child and studies.  His business is selling clothes.  He has been in this business for more than 5 years.  He started out selling certain products but didn't have much working capital.  His business was an inheritance from his family.  His main objective is to fulfil the needs of his customers, offering them what they need.  This is why he is turning to  Fundación León 2000.  Through them and other friendly organizations who give necessary support he has requested a loan to provide working capital for raw materials.  Henry's wish is to expand his business.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Adzovi

texts.fr: Elom est une femme de 27 ans elle est mariée et vit avec son époux dans le quartier d'avédji qui est un quartier périphérique de la ville de Lomé. son  mari est un technicien employé dans une société de la place. Il a nommé son entreprise " GIFT of GOD". elle s'approvisionne très souvent au grand marché de Lomé qui est un marché très dynamique à lomé; elle a une ancienneté de 6 ans dans ce commerce. sa clientèle est en majorité féminine. pour répondre à la demande de plus en plus élevée de sa clientèle surtout en cette période de fête de fin d'année.elle sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour l'achat de 10 cartons de défrisant, 2 cartons de mèches et 2 cartons de tissages.
texts.en: Elom is a 27 year-old married woman who lives with her husband in the Avédji quarter which is on the outskirts of Lomé. Her husband is a technician and works for a company nearby.  She called her business 'Gift of God'. She sources her goods from the large market in Lomé which is very dynamic.  She has been running this business for over 6 years and her customer base is mainly made up of women. In order to meet her customers' growing demand she is seeking a loan from WAGES to buy 10 packs of hair straighteners, 2 boxes of highlight inserts and 2 boxes of weaves.

loans.use: purchase of hair straighteners, weaves and other products

loans.name: Alidou

texts.fr: alidou est une homme de 42 ans, il a appris la mécanique auto, étant marié et père de 3 enfants, il vit avec sa famille dans le quartier d'agoè vakpossito. il a ouvert son propre garage qu'il a appelé " AGOE VAKPOSSITO", il s'approvisionne au marché local du port autonome de Lomé. il a une ancienneté de 10 ans dans son commerce.il dispose d'une grande clientèle et réalise souvent de bonnes recettes. il sollicite de WAGES un crédit pour l'achat d'un palan de 2 tonnes.
texts.en: Alidou is a 42-year old man. He is a learned auto mechanic. He is married and the father of three. He lives with his family in the Agoè Vakpossito district. He has opened his own auto repair shop which he has named “Agoe Vakpossito.” He buys supplies at the local market of the port of Lomé. He has 10 years of experience in this business. He has a large customer base and often realizes significant number of sales. He is seeking a loan from WAGES to purchase a 2-ton vehicle lift.

loans.use: Purchasing a 2-ton vehicle lift

loans.name: Adelia

texts.es:
Adelia F. finalmente esta mas tranquila con su seguridad porque con su credikiva anterior compró una reja y adicionalmente como invirtió en publicidad ahora sus ventas se ha aumentado ligeramente y esto la entuisiasma;  está renovando su credikiva para comprar tela y madera, pues cada dia estos insumos aumentan sus precios y ella quiere aprovechar oportunidades en el mercado, para continuar respondiendole a sus clientes como ellos lo solicitan. Si usted quiere conocer la historia de Adelia siga el siguiente enlace:
http://kiva.org/lend/202261
texts.en:
Adelia F. is finally more at ease regarding her safety because she used her previous Kiva loan to buy a metal grate.  She also invested in publicity and now her sales have increased slightly which excites her.

She is renewing her Kiva loan to buy fabric and wood because these supplies are becoming more expensive every day and she wants to take advantage of market opportunities in order to continue responding to customers in the manner they expect.

If you’d like to know Adelia’s story, please visit the following link:

http://kiva.org/lend/202261

loans.use: To buy fabric and wood.

loans.name: Luz Divina 1 & 2 Group

texts.es:
Maria es una de los miembros del Grupo Luz Divina 1 & 2; localizado en Los Alcarrizos ubicada al norte de la ciudad de Santo Domingo y es muy industrializada, y con una gran población que también dependen del las empresas y economía de la ciudad principal, en donde como muchas otras ciudades hay escasez de agua potable y de energía eléctrica y con una población de dominicanos y emigrantes haitianos. Esta asociada de Esperanza se dedica a la venta de zapatos, para hombre, mujeres y niños. Maria es madre soltera de 2 hijos, nos dice que su reto o desafío más difícil es poder salir adelante y ayudar a sus sus hijos. Disfruta mucho hacer negocio, por lo que es su actividad favorita.

Maria está muy emocionada de recibir su 4to. préstamo en Esperanza Internacional, después de haber pagado satisfactoriamente sus préstamos anteriores y así haber dado un paso para el crecimiento de su negocio. Ella ha tenido su negocio por alrededor de 3 años, el cual inició por que una amiga la motivo a que entrara en la venta de productos (calzados) por catalogo. Está planificando invertir su nuevo préstamo en la compra de varias docenas de zapatos de hombre, mujeres y niños. Esta Planeando utilizar sus ganancias para suplir sus necesidades como familia y ahorrar. Su sueño es tener su vivienda propia y poder seguir negociando.
texts.en:
María is one of the members of the “Luz Divina 1 y 2” (Divine Light 1 & 2) group located in Los Alcarrizos which is a very industrialized area in the north part of the city of Santo Domingo.  It has a large population that depends on firms and the economy in the main city.  Like in many other cities, drinking water and electricity are scarce.  The population is composed both of Dominicans and Haitian immigrants.  

This Esperanza associate sells men’s, women’s and children’s shoes.  María is a single mother of two children.  She tells us that her most difficult challenge is getting ahead and helping her children.  She enjoys business very much; it’s her favorite activity.

María is excited to receive her 4th loan from Esperanza Internacional having satisfactorily repaid her previous loans and taken a step toward her business’ growth.  She has had her business for about 3 years which she started because a girl friend encouraged her to go into the catalogue shoe selling business.

She plans to use her new loan to buy several dozen shoes for men, women and children.  She plans to use her profits to cover family expenses and to save.  Her dream is to own a house of her own and to be able to stay in business.

loans.use: To buy shoes and other products.

loans.name: German Diego

texts.es: El Señor German vive en casa en alquiler con su esposa y sus hijitos, el es transportista pero también ayuda en la actividad de la esposa que es la elaboración de empanadas, terminando de preparar las empanadas el se va y trabaja en el transporte ya que no les alcanza con la elaboración de las empanadas y su esposa va a vender las empanadas por el mercado de la zona. El señor saco el crédito para la compra de harina y otros por mayor ya que en las fechas de todos santos venden mucho, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en:
Señor German lives in rented accommodation with his wife and children. He is a driver for a haulage contractor, but he also helps his wife make empanadas (stuffed pastries). Once he’s finished helping her, he leaves for his other work as making pastries alone doesn’t provide them with enough income. His wife sells them in a nearby market.

German is seeking a loan to buy flour and other ingredients at wholesale prices since at holiday times they sell a lot of empanadas. He is very grateful to the institution for the help they offer him in obtaining a loan.

loans.use: to buy flour and other ingredients at wholesale prives

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: Maria De Los Ángeles tiene 42 años, su estado civil es casada. Tiene 2 hijos y ambos estudian. La actividad económica es la venta de refrescos. Hace más de 45años que se dedica a este negocio. Inicio este negocio por la necesidad de salir adelante con sus hijos, por lo que decide buscar este medio de supervivencia. Los propósitos propuestos por ella para su negocio son de incrementar la venta y ofrecer refrescos de calidad. El financiamiento es destinado para capital de trabajo y comprar frutas frescas para preparar sus deliciosos jugos naturales. El deseo de Maria es darle las mejoras necesarias a su vivienda y lograr esta oportunidad de superación.
texts.en:
42-year old Maria de los Angeles is married and has two children, both of whom are students. She earns her living selling soft drinks, a job she’s been doing for the last 4-5 years. 

Maria started this work as she needed income to support her children and help them make progress in life. She plans to use the loan to make  quality drinks and increase sales. Specifically she will buy fresh fruit to make delicious natural juices. 

Her great wish is to make some necessary improvements to her house and to succeed in this opportunity to get ahead.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Bella Barbarita

texts.es:
Bella de 50 años, es comerciante informal, vive en una zona periurbana llamada Paraíso de la flor ubicada en una zona caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra y montañas.  

Hace dos años atrás comenzó a trabajar como comerciante informal ya que le gusta recorrer las calles vendiendo artículos, accesorios, plásticos etc. Trabaja desde las 09h00am hasta las 12h00 todos los días. Vende tazas, bandejas, platos, accesorios etc. Una de las complicaciones para que realice su trabajo es el sol ya que camina para vender sus artículos. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar bandejas, platos y hacer unas adecuaciones en su casa comprando cemento. En el futuro quiere tener su casa bien distribuida para darle una mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en:
50-year old Bella is an informal merchant. She lives in the suburb of Paraíso de la Flor located in an area known for its unpaved streets and its mountains.

Bella began her business two years ago, and she enjoys walking through the streets selling various items such as household accessories, merchandise made from plastic etc. She starts work at 9am and finishes at 12 everyday. She sells cups, trays, plates, items for the house etc. One of the things that sometimes bothers her is the hot sun as she walks the streets.

With the loan Bella will buy trays and plates, and also cement to make some changes to her house. Her future plans include having a better laid-out house so that her family can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy trays, plates, cement

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: El Sr. Miguel  se dedica al servicio de chapería quien debe despertar a diario a muy tempranas horas de la mañana para poder ayudar  a la  esposa en quehaceres de la casa para luego poder dedicarse durante el día a su trabajo, es amante de los vehículos pues manifiesta que el es medico de los autos ya que a diario se encuentra manteniendo y reparando vehículos, el dinero que ahora solicita lo necesita para  la compra de mayor material tales como pinturas y otros esto debido a la amplia demanda que tiene, es un cliente ,muy responsable y trabajador, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Miguel works as a panel beater.  He must wake up very early every morning so that he can help his wife with some household chores before he spends the rest of the day at his work.  He loves vehicles and he tells us that he is a 'vehicle doctor' since he spends every day maintaining and repairing vehicles.  The money he is currently requesting is needed to buy more material such as paint owing to the high demand which he has.  He is a very responsible client and hard working.  He is very grateful to the institution for their support.

loans.use: To buy material for his panel beating business

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es:
Doña María, tiene 50 años D. edad, resiD. en Santa Elena departamento D. Usulután, se dedica a la crianza D. cerdos para comercializarlos cuando estos ya están gorditos; ella vive con su esposo únicamente porque su única hija D. 30 años D. edad, está casada y tiene su propia casa.
Este negocio comenzó por iniciativa propia, observando cómo sus vecinos que se dedican al mismo oficio lo realizaban y D. esta manera lo decidió empezar ella, trabaja junto a su esposo y no tienen horario D. trabajo; Ella quiere comprar más cerdos y para realizar la inversión solicita un préstamo que le dé la oportunidad D. adquirir cerdos pequeños y comenzar el proceso D. crecerlos y engordarlos para luego comercializarlos, con esta inversión ella espera que todo el proceso D. crecimiento sea favorable y al momento D. venderlos puedan retribuir el gasto que realizara en ello.
Ella sueña con ampliar su granja, realizar una buena inversión con el préstamo y generar los suficientes ingresos para poder algún día construir una vivienda más apropiada para compartirla con su familia.
texts.en:
Doña María is 50 years old.  She lives in Santa Elena in Usulután department.  She works raising pigs to fatten and sell.  She only lives with her husband because her daughter is 30 years old, married and has her own home.

This business was started on her own initiative.  She saw how her neighbors who had the same business carried it out and decided to start herself.  She works together with her husband and they don't have fixed working hours.  She would like to buy more pigs and in order to do this she is requesting a loan which will allow her to acquire some young pigs and begin the process of fattening them so that she can sell them later on.  With this investment she hopes that the whole growth process will be favorable and that when she comes to sell her pigs the money she makes will cover the expense she has incurred.  She dreams of expanding her farm, making a good investment with her loan and making sufficient income to be able to some day build a more suitable home to share with her family.

loans.use: To buy pigs

loans.name: Luz Divina 3 Group

texts.es:
Sonia es una de los miembros del Grupo Luz Divina 3; localizado en Los Alcarrizos ubicada al norte de la ciudad de Santo Domingo y es muy industrializada, y con una gran población que también dependen del las empresas y economía de la ciudad principal, en donde como muchas otras ciudades hay escasez de agua potable y de energía eléctrica y con una población de dominicanos y emigrantes haitianos. Esta asociada de Esperanza se dedica a la venta de ropa ambulatoria y con una pequeña tienda en su casa. Sonia es madre soltera de 1 hijo, con el cual vive y dedica su tiempo a criarle mientras trabaja. Nos dice que su reto o desafío más difícil conseguir dinero y poder proveer lo necesario para su casa y poder ayudar a sus padres.

Sonia está muy emocionada de recibir su 3to. préstamo en Esperanza Internacional, después de haber pagado satisfactoriamente sus préstamos anteriores y así haber dado un paso para el crecimiento de su negocio. Ella ha tenido su negocio por alrededor de 2 años, el cual inició al adquirir una ayuda de un familiar quien le ofreció la vender juntas ropa. Está planificando invertir su nuevo préstamo en la compra de diversas variedades de vestir, como pantalones, faldas, camisas, accesorios, etc. Esta Planeando utilizar sus ganancias para re-invertir en su negocio y así poder tener mas y mejores mercancías. Su sueño es poder tener una familia saludable y feliz.
texts.en:
Sonia is a member of “Luz Divina 3” group which is located in Los Alcarrizos in the north of the city of Santo Domingo.  It is a very industrialized place with a large population which depends on the businesses and economy of the main city.  As in many other cities, there is a scarcity of potable water and electricity, and a population of Dominicans and Haitian emigrants.  Sonia works selling clothes in the streets and in a small store in her home.  Sonia is a single mother and has one child with whom she lives.  She devotes her time to raising him while she works.  She tells us that her biggest challenge is making enough money, being able to provide for her household and being able to help her parents.

Sonia is very excited to be receiving her 3rd loan from Esperanza Internacional after having satisfactorily repaid her previous loans and having taken a step further in growing her business.  She has had her business for around 2 years.  She started her business with the help of a family member who suggested they sell clothes together.  She is planning to invest her new loan in the purchase of a range of different clothes such as pants, skirts, shirts, accessories, etc.  She is planning to use her profits to re-invest in her business, thereby enabling herself to have more and better merchandise.  Her dream is to be able to have a healthy and happy family.

loans.use: To buy clothes

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Don Víctor Manuel, un señor trabajador de 60 años de edad, trabaja en la alcaldía Municipal de El Transito como barrendero, él vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 18 y 16 años de edad quienes dependen económicamente de él. Residen en San Rafael Oriente departamento de Usulután,  cuenta con 30 años de experiencia en su trabajo con un horario de 8:00am á 4:00pm.
Don Víctor está en proceso de reparar su vivienda ya que la cocina tiene malo el techo, por lo que solicita un préstamo que le permita realizar este trabajo, ya que con esta ayuda estará mejorando las condiciones de su vivienda y su familia está más segura, tranquila y sin preocupación por algún accidente domestico.
El quiere ofrecer a su familia una vivienda segura y administrar bien el presente crédito para tener la confianza de seguir trabajando de esta manera.
texts.en:
Victor Manuel is a hard-working, 60 year-old man.  He works for the city of El Transito as a street sweeper.  He lives with his wife and two children aged 18 and 16 who are financially dependent on him.  They live in San Rafael Oriente in Usulután department.  He has 30 years of experience in his job and works from 8.00am to 4.00pm.

Víctor is in the process of repairing his house since he has problems with his kitchen roof.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan which will allow him to carry out this work.  With this help he will be improving the conditions of his house and his family will be safer, more relaxed and won't have to worry about domestic accidents.

He would like to offer his family a safe home and manage his present loan well so that he has the confidence to continue working in this way.

loans.use: To buy building materials

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Virgen De Los Angeles Group

texts.es: El  representante  del  grupo  es  José, un joven   emprendedor que     por circunstancias de la vida empezó a trabajar desde muy joven realiza el servicio de pintado de interiores y texturas  en la zona es muy conocido por el buen trabajo que hace ,para trabajos  grandes   el contrata un ayudante , el vive en alquiler en casa de su madrina ,el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de sus herramientas de trabajo y pinturas para realizar su trabajo , es un grupo de vecinos  se conocen  de  hace muchos años ,son muy conocidas en la zona   por ser personas muy responsables y trabajadoras, el préstamo lo destinaran para su mercadería y aumentar capital .
texts.en: This group's representative is José, an enterprising young man who, through circumstance, started working when he was very young.   He offers an interior painting service.  He is very well known in his district because of the good work which he does.  For large jobs he contracts an assistant.  He lives in a rented room in his godmother's house. He will invest his loan in buying work tools and paint so that he can carry out his work.  This is a group of neighbors who have known each other for many years.  They are very well known in their district as being very responsible and hard-working people.  They will use their loan to buy merchandise and increase their capital.

loans.use: To buy paint and brushes for interior painting

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es: Juan Bautista tiene 62 años, es un hombre casado. Su actividad económica es brindar el servicio de transporte  la cual surge como una nueva fuente de ingreso para su familia. Este le ha permitido mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y brindarle ingresos a su familia por, lo que tiene una ruta destinada en donde sus diferentes clientes disfrutan de su servicio. Y es por esto que solicita a Fundación León 2000 un financiamiento de manera que le permita comprar llantas, repuestos y otras reparaciones necesarias. Los deseos de Juan son aumentar sus ventas y mantener el núcleo familiar estable en todos los ámbitos.
texts.en: Juan Bautista is 62 years old.  He is a married man.  His business activity is providing transport services which is a new source of income for his family.  This has enabled him to improve his quality of life a little and provide his family with income.  He has a designated route where his customers enjoy his service.  He is requesting a loan from Fundación León 2000 to buy tires, spare parts and other necessary repairs.  Juan's wishes are to increase his sales and keep his family unit stable.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Colibri X Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Colibrí X  se formó con 9 señoras,  les gusto el nombre porque en la casa de la reunión la señora María Antonia G., quien es la tesorera del grupo, llegan estas hermosas aves y son sus favoritas. La presidenta se llama Yuridia O. tiene una carpintería con muy buena afluencia de trabajos.   Yuridia comparte sus ideales con su esposo y trabaja muy duro con su marido en la carpintería, hace unos días terminaron juntos una cocina integral bastante bonita y ya cuentan con más pedidos de muebles de cocina. Todas y cada una de ellas tiene una historia diferente pero en general son mujeres trabajadoras con negocios creados a base de sacrificios todo con el afán de darles un mejor futuro a sus hijos, emprendedoras y dedicadas para conseguir un préstamo que impulse sus actividades económicas En términos generales este grupo al día de hoy está sumamente motivado, el crédito lo quieren para invertir en sus negocios y esperan que el nombre del colibrí y su presencia les de suerte. Observaciones: En la foto aparece una niña atras con gorra.
texts.en:
This group, called Colibri X (Hummingbird X), is composed of 9 married women.  They like the name because in Maria's house where they meet (she is the treasurer of the group), these beautiful birds visit and they are her favorites.

The president, Yuridia, has a carpentry shop with a good supply of work to be done.  Yuridia shares her ideals with her husband and works hard with him in the carpentry shop.  Just recently, they completed a very pretty integral kitchen and they can already count on more orders for kitchen furniture.

Each and every one of these women has a different history, but in general they are hard-working women with businesses created on the basis of personal sacrifices, with the hope of providing a better future for their children.  They are enterprising and dedicated to obtaining a loan that will promote their economic activities.

In general terms, this group today is very motivated.  They want the loan to invest in their businesses and they hope that the name of the hummingbird and its presence will give them good luck.

Observations: In the photo a girl appears in the back with a cap.

loans.use: TO INVEST IN THEIR FURNITURE MAKING BUSINESS

loans.name: Rosa Lilian

texts.es:
Rosa, posee un taller de costura, reside con su hija de 8 años en El Transito, departamento de San Miguel, ella es madre soltera y sus ingresos son los únicos con los que cuenta su hogar. Este oficio lo aprendió a lado de una amiga que se dedica a esta misma actividad, ella realiza el trabajo de costura en su casa, no tiene horario fijo para desempeñar su trabajo.
Actualmente se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo ya que quiere comprar tela, hilo y una nueva máquina de costura, toda esta inversión la puede llevar a cabo por medio de un préstamo por que ella no cuenta con la solvencia económica suficiente para realizarla.
Sus proyectos son instalar un taller de costura grande, atender a muchos clientes y tener empleados para sacar todo el trabajo, velar por las necesidades de su hija especialmente por su educación y salud.
texts.en:
Rosa owns her own sewing workshop.  She lives with her 8 year-old daughter in El Transito, in San Miguel department.  She is a single mother and her income is the only one which her family has.  She learned her trade from a friend who does the same work.  She does her sewing work from her home.  She doesn't work fixed hours.

Currently she is requesting a loan because she would like to buy fabric, thread and a new sewing machine.  She will use this loan to make this investment as she doesn't have the necessary finances to do it herself.

Her plans are to set up a bigger sewing workshop, serve lots of customers, to have employees to do the work and to look after the needs of her daughter, especially as regards her education and health.

loans.use: To buy thread, fabric and a sewing machine to make clothes

loans.name: Melva Rosa

texts.es: Melva Rosa tiene 54 años. Su actividad económica es el destace de res. Hace más de 18 años que se dedica a este trabajo, por lo que siempre le ha gustado.  Esta no es la primera vez que solicita créditos, pues la experiencia ha sido gratificante. Por lo que anteriormente se dedica al destace de cerdo, pero al no contar con el dinero suficiente, no continuo con este negocio por lo que en la familia se dedicaban a este tipo de negocio y fue así que mas tarde Melva decide establecer su propio negocio en su vivienda. Este crédito es para la compra de ganado.
texts.en: Melva Rosa is 54 years. Her business is butchering cattle. She's been dedicated to this work for more than 18 years, she's always liked it. This is not the first time that she's applied for credit, as the experience has been rewarding.  She was previously working as a pig butcher, but not having enough money, did not continue with this business.  As her family were dedicated to this kind of business, Melva later decided to establish her own business in her home. This credit is for the purchase of cattle.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis Enrique B. está renovando su credikiva para comprar artículos deportivos y de contado, aumentar el surtido de su negocio y despertar el interés de sus clientes  en su oferta. El credikiva anterior le ha permitido no acudir a prestamistas con altos intereses  por eso esta ganando mas dinero cada vez que vende un articulo. Siempre su esposa y él estan unidos en todo,  por eso aperecen juntos en la fotografia.
Si usted quiere conocer la historia de Luis Enrique haga clip en el siguiente enlace:
http://kiva.org/lend/189076
texts.en:
Luis Enrique B. is renewing his Kiva loan to buy sporting goods in cash, to increase his business' stock and to stir up his customers' interest in what he has to offer.  His previous Kiva loan allowed him to steer clear of moneylenders with high interest rates.  This has meant that he has makes more money each time he sells something.  He and his wife are united in everything, for this reason they appear together in the photograph.

If you would like to know more about Luis Enrique's story, follow this link:
http://kiva.org/lend/189076

loans.use: To buy sporting goods wholesale and in cash

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María forma parte del banco comunal “Con Fuerza y Unión”  perteneciente a la ciudad de Curicó. Ella hace manteles, carpetas y cortinas de baño entre otros productos para el hogar, con cintas y en tejidos a crochet, desde hace 3 años. Antes de este negocio vendía comida rápida junto a su hija. 
Con el préstamo que recibirá comprará telas, hilos y cintas. 
Su sueño es comprar una máquina de coser, ya que no tiene, por lo que debe mandar a coser algunas terminaciones. 
A María le han ayudado mucho los préstamos de Fondo Esperanza para seguir con su negocio. Además ha  vivido buenos momentos de convivencia junto a sus compañeros.
Curicó se ubica en la región del Maule, zona centro del país. El clima de Curicó es de tipo mediterráneo y es considerado como uno de los más agradables del país. Se caracteriza además por su cultura en torno al vino y sus alrededores de una belleza mágicamente natural.
texts.en:
María is part of the village bank, “Con Fuerza y Unión”  ("With Strength and Unity"), in the city of Curicó. She has worked for three years making tablecloths, carpets, and shower curtains, among other home decor products, using crochet and ribbons. Before starting this business, she sold fast food with her daughter. She will use the loan to purchase fabric, thread and ribbons. She dreams of purchasing a sewing machine. Since she doesn't have one, she has to send away to have certain items finished by machine. The loans that María has received from Fondo Esperanza (Hope Fund) for her business have been an enormous help. Moreover, she's had a great time with her coworkers.

Curicó is located in the Maule region in the center of the country. Curicó has a Mediterranean climate and it is considered to have some of the nicest weather in the country. Curicó is also known for its wine culture and the magical natural beauty of the surrounding areas.

loans.use: Fabric, thread and ribbons

loans.name: Ricardo Antonio

texts.es:
Ricardo, tiene un taller de zapatería, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, tiene 49 años de edad, vive con su esposa y actualmente  no tienen hijos, él lleva cerca de 30 años de dedicarse al negocio de calzado y lo tiene ubicado en el mercado municipal, su horario de trabajo es de 7:00am a 2:00pm. Don Ricardo está solicitando un préstamo pues quiere comprar material como hilo, suelas, hule y pega, entre otros que le son necesarios para poder realizar su trabajo.
Este préstamo le ayudara a tener todos los materiales necesarios y atender la demanda de trabajo de sus clientes; además le dará estabilidad laboral pues así tendrá más zapatos que reparar; Su propósito es ampliar el taller e ir creciendo poco a poco hasta lograr una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Ricardo has a cobbler's workshop.  He lives in El Transito department in San Miguel.  He is 49 years old and lives with his wife.  They currently don't have any children.  He has been in the footwear business for more than 30 years.  His business is located in the town market.  His work day is from 7.00am to 2.00pm.  Ricardo is requesting a loan because he would like to buy material such as thread, soles, rubber and glue amongst other things which are necessary for him to carry out his work.

This loan will help him to have all the necessary materials and serve his customers' demands.  In addition, it will give him stability in his work as he will have more shoes to repair.  His intention is to expand his workshop and grow little by little until he achieves a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy thread, soles, rubber and glue

loans.name: La Virgen De Guadalupe Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama La Virgen de Guadalupe, debido a la fe que tienen las integrantes hacia la virgen de Guadalupe. Está ubicado en el Estado de México. El grupo esta conformado por 11 integrantes.La señora Matilde Martínez A. es integrante del grupo, tiene 36 años estudio hasta la primaria, tiene una panadería y en total tiene 5 hijos. Ella se dedica a vender pan que inicio hace 5 años, empezó comprando y vendiendo, ahora gracias a los pequeños préstamos ha podido lograr ya elaborar pan junto con su esposo, y vender en diferentes partes del municipio. Gracias a las ganancias que ha tenido con la elaboración del pan, ha logrado comprar un carro para poderles vender su pan a comunidades lejanas. Sus clientes están agradecidos con ella, porque ya pueden comprar pan en su comunidad, sin tener que salir a comprar a otro lado, además de que el sabor de su pan es diferente a los demás.Ella solicita este nuevo crédito para comprar harina y comprar más canastos para incrementar su producción y así ir logrando sus objetivos. Esta luchando para darles una mejor educación a sus hijos, comenta no le gustaría que sus hijos vivieran y sufrieran lo mismo que ellos, le gustaría darles una carrera a ellos para que tengan una mejor vida. Otro de sus sueños es tener expendios de pan en varias comunidades del Municipio para lograr todo lo que quieren darles a sus hijos.
texts.en: This group is called the Virgin of Guadalupe due to the faith that the members have in the Virgin of Guadalupe. It is located in Mexico State. The group is made up of 11 members. Ms. Matilde Martínez A. is a member of the group. She is 36 years old and studied through primary school. She has a bakery and a total of 5 children. She has been selling bread since she started 5 years ago. She started by buying the bread and selling it, but now, thanks to the small loans, she makes the bread along with her husband, and they sell it in various parts of the municipality. Thanks to the profits they have made from baking bread, she has been able to buy a car that enables them to sell the bread in communities that are farther away. Her customers are grateful to her, since they can now buy bread in their communities without having to go far away, in addition to the fact that her bread has a different flavor than other bread. Matilde is seeking this new loan to buy flour and to buy more baskets to increase her production and so meet her goals. She is fighting to give her children a better education. She comments that she would not like her children to live through and suffer what they did. She would like to give them careers so that they have a better life. Another of her dreams is to have bread shops in various communities in the Municipality to achieve all that they want to give their children.

loans.use: To buy flour and more bread baskets.

loans.name: Moises Adali

texts.es:
Moisés, de 30 años de edad, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de medicinas, este negocio lo inicio por la necesidad de llevar a su familia la alimentación diaria, no tiene horario fijo para realizar las ventas y por el momento enfrenta la situación de poseer suficiente medicinas para ofrecer a los clientes, lo que lo lleva a solicitar un préstamo que le ayude a compra diferentes clases de medicinas para toda clase de enfermedades, y de esta manera que sus clientes puedan comprarle y contar con la preferencia de estos.
El sueña convertirse en un vendedor mayorista y recibir jugosas ganancias para dar a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
30-year-old Moisés lives in San Rafael Oriente, in the department of San Miguel. He sells medicine. He started this business because of the need to provide for his family’s daily food needs. He does not have a fixed schedule for making his sales. At the moment, he is facing the situation of not having enough medicines to offer his customers, which is what leads him to request a loan that will help him to buy different types of medicine for all kinds of sicknesses. This way his customers will buy from him, and he will be their preferred seller.
He dreams of becoming a wholesale vender and earning substantial profits to give his family greater economic stability and quality of life.

loans.use: To buy medicines

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Jacqueline Elizabeth

texts.es:
Jacqueline de 31 años, es lavandera de casa en casa, vive en una zona periurbana llamada Perimetral zona caracterizada porque está rodeada de un estero.  

Por la falta de oportunidades tuvo que comenzar a trabajar como lavandera en casas que la contrataban. Poco a poco tuvo clientela para lavar ropa en casas. En la actualidad sigue con esta actividad trabajando en algunas casas lavando sus ropas a mano y con una tipa para poder mantener a sus dos hijos que estudian en una escuela fiscal ya que está separada. Trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 15h00pm todos los días. 

Con el préstamo quiere readecuar su casa comprando cemento, pinturas para darles más comodidad a sus hijos. En el futuro quiere comprar lavadoras para tener su propia lavandería.
texts.en:
31-year-old Jacqueline washes laundry from house to house. She lives in the peri-urban zone called perimetral, which is characterized for being surrounded by a marsh.

Because of the lack of opportunities, she had to start working as a laundry maid in houses that contracted her. Little by little she built a client base to hire her to wash clothing in their homes. Currently, she continues working washing clothing in a few homes and with a woman to take care of her two children, who study in a public school, since she is separated. She works from 7am to 3pm every day. 

With the loan, she wants to readapt her house, buying cement and paint to make it more comfortable for her children. In the future she wants to buy washing machines in order to have her own laundromat.

loans.use: Cement, paint

loans.name: Marcelo Dario

texts.es: El Sr. Marcelo es un cliente nuevo de la institución el señor tiene dos hijos una pequeña de siete años la cual es de su primer matrimonio y con su segunda esposa  tiene un pequeño de dos meses, El Sr. Marcelo trabaja como transportista y en la noche esta estudiando contaduría publica en la universidad ya que quiere superarse para darles una vida mejor a su familia, la movilidad que esta manejando  la esta pagando a cuotas mensuales, su esposa le ayuda con un pequeño restaurant que tienen y que por motivo del embarazo lo tubo que dejar unos cuatro meses, el préstamo que solicitan es para terminar de pagar la movilidad y así poder tramitar los papeles de la movilidad a su nombre, su  esposa quieren comenzar la venta de pollos a broaster por la noche en el restaurante, y asi poder hacer realidad su sueño que es el de comprarse su propia casa. En la foto el Sr. Marcelo esta acompañado de su familia.
texts.en: Marcelo is a new client with the institution. He has two children: a little 7-year-old girl from his first marriage, and with his second wife he has a little boy who is two months old. Marcelo works in transportation and at night is studying public accounting, since he wants to better himself in order to give his family a better life.  He gets paid monthly for driving a taxi. His wife helps him with a small restaurant they have and that she had to leave for four months because of the pregnancy. The loan they are seeking is to finish paying off the taxi, and thus be able to process the paperwork for putting the taxi in his name, and his wife wants to start selling fried chicken at night in the restaurant, and so to be able to realize the dream of buying their own home. In the photo is Marcelo accompanied by his family.

loans.use: To finish paying off the taxi and also for an activity for his wife.

loans.name: Manuel Alexis

texts.es:
Manuel, reside en Concepción Batres, departamento de Usulután, donde vive con sus padres y un hermano, es soltero y tiene 20 años de edad, en su familia todos trabajan; él es empleado desde hace un año en una gasolinera con el cargo de jefe de pista, su horario es rotativo  y en este momento su casa tiene la necesidad de reparar el portón por lo que solicita un préstamo para pagar mano de obra y comprar los materiales que se necesiten para reparar el portón de su vivienda.
Este préstamo le ayudara a dar una mejor vistosidad a su vivienda, así mismo su familia estará más segura. El desea dar a su familia estabilidad económica para enfrentar cualquier situación imprevista es por eso que quiere seguir trabajando y luchado por mejorar las condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Manuel lives in Concepcion Batres in the Usulutan department. He is 20, single, and lives with his parents and a brother. Everyone in his family works. For the past year he has worked rotating shifts at a gas station as lot boss. 

The gate to his house needs to be repaired, so he has requested a loan to pay for labor and materials to fix it. This loan will help improve the home's appearance as well as increasing its security. He hopes to provide the financial stability to his family to deal with unforeseen events which is why he wants to keep working and striving to improve living conditions.

loans.use: Repair the family home's gate.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge de 33 años de edad, reside en Santa Elena departamento de Usulután, se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad, él vive con su esposa y dos hijas de 6 y 5 años de edad, quienes dependen económicamente de él.
Este negocio inicio hace 4 años que le surgió la idea de invertir sus ahorros en una tienda que ofreciera a sus vecinos todos los productos necesarios para el hogar; lo atiende de 7:00am a 6:00pm, actualmente necesita invertir en su negocio y solicita un préstamo para comprar productos de la canasta básica y que le es demandado a diario por los clientes como azúcar, frijoles, maíz, esto le ayudara a mantener satisfechos a los clientes y al mismo tiempo no perderá de vender al contrario podrá aumentar sus ingresos.
El sueño de don Jorge es  poseer  un negocio grande que sea capaz de atender a muchos clientes, ofrecer de toda clase de mercadería y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge is 33 years old and lives in Santa Elena, Department of Usulutan.  He sells basic staples and lives with his wife and two daughters, ages 6 and 5, who are economically dependent on him.

This business started 4 years ago with the idea of investing their savings in a store that would offer their neighbors all the necessary products for their homes.  The store is open from 7:00 AM to 6:00 PM.  Jorge now needs to invest in his business and is requesting a loan to buy basic food products as his customers demand sugar, beans, and corn on a daily basis.  Increasing supplies will help keep his customers satisfied and at the same time may increase his income.

Jorge's dream is to own a big business that is able to serve many customers and offer all kinds of goods, to improve the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: To buy beans, sugar, oil and corn.

loans.name: Silvia Zoila

texts.es:
